item.title: One Week with Colemak
item.description: Last weekend, I decided to switch from QWERTY to Colemak keyboard layout. Did I suffer a lot since then? Of course no, well, maybe a little bit. After “one-week intensive typing training”, actually I quite enjoy the fresh feeling of typing with Colemak. I’m pretty happy that now I am able to type on Colemak keyboard layout with the average speed 50 WPM. I would say that it’s good enough for daily life.
